attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i blindly support our idiot cheeto 🍊president 👁👄👁. it took a whole week to download, only for it to start glitching 📲. at first, it asked for my social security number. of course, i trust donald with my life because he said i should, so i gave it to them. next thing you know, my phone got FLOODED my phone with terrible viruses, and my bank account is now at a balance of zero 💵. it even gave me a terrible allergic reaction, and made me vulnerable to the coronavirus✨. trump said we don’t need masks and the virus is a hoax, so i left my house without covering my face and didn’t social distance at all. now i have a bad cough 😷. i had to get airlifted to the hospital and now i’m even more broke and have thousands of dollars in debt because of medical fees 🥳. trump and his administration should have handled this app just like the should have handled the f****** pandemic. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!! ITS SUCKS🤭🤕👿😾🖕🏼👅🐷🐷🐷🐷🐷🐷🐷
attributes.title: worst app on the face of the earth

attributes.review: This man has shown plenty of people countless times over and over again how he is unfit to run in office. furthermore restricting applications that obviously have opposing beliefs as you and claiming that it’s for our safety? Trash. This is a restriction our freedom of speech. This is our first amendment right. And as for those of you respecting his decision claiming that it’s for our own good in addition claiming that our data and safety is being transmitted throughout China and Hong Kong? Apple Samsung and Google phones have extensive protection to ensure that our data and personal information will not be used in the wrong hands.This all boils down to the presidents ego, or what’s left of it. Furthermore making this a restriction of our freedom of speech and opinions and political beliefs. In addition may I remind you that four people died from Ebola under Obama‘s administration and he was repeatedly harassed to be taken out of office, however 134,000 Americans have perished under trumps administration due to COVID-19. One of which was including my own father. Due to trumps incompetence our cases are starting to spike back up. Trump fuels the fire for people who believe that masks are a choice however it has been scientifically proven that they limit the spread of COVID-19 almost triple. IN ADDITION The people who support trump chat “my body my choice” when it comes to wearing facemasks to prevent a deadly disease, however when a woman wants to have an abortion due  health problems or any issues they claim that abortion is murder. However when women protest for their bodily rights chanting “my body my choice” it’s an issue. This doesn’t even take into account the child trafficking sexual abuse, misogyny, racism, and xenophobia that this man has contributed to the world. Donald Trump is fueling a fire of a burning democracy. A vote for him is a vote for a less progressive country and world.
attributes.title: Why is this man even still in office?

attributes.title: This app blows

attributes.review:
I got this app to support our wonderful ✨cheeto✨ but it took two weeks to download, and tried to steal all my information, it sends thousands of spam emails daily. i then proceed to hear voices in my head telling me to vote for him so i went to the doctor 👩‍⚕️ because it was like reallyyy scary, the doctor told me i was fine and sent me home. so i deleted the app and the voices stopped but all my pets starting dying 
my fish drowned, my dog exploded, and my hamster evaporated, red writing appeared on my wall telling me to download the app back or else. so waiting another two weeks for the app to download again they asked me for my social security number and then i got a call from someone with a deep scary voice 😫 saying vote for trump or i will kill you and your stuff animals. so then i was like this has to stop bc I WONT LET ANYTHING HAPPEN TO FLUFFY FOREIGNER💕AND DIDDLY PICKLE BEAR🐻 . so i deleted the app again then the only thing i remember is waking up in a hospital half dead. so i downloaded the app again bc i didn’t want to die, but then a tall  dark figure stood in the corner of my room saying you won’t be able to delete the app again it’s locked in. so i tried to delete bc nobody tells me what to do but it wouldn’t delete and every time i tried to somebody died and a nude picture of mr orange cheeto ✨❤️ will pop up. will not download again -363738 out of 10 sooo not worth it.  if you love your life do not download. 
👁👄👁
attributes.title: AWFUL APP

attributes.review: I originally downloaded the app to support our great 🍊orange🍊 president a little to much self tan if you ask me🥰 All was going well until weird things started to happen. I was walking on the street and old pervert men were screaming very racist things. As I got back to my car it was covered in Trump 2020 stickers and flags and merch. I was very scared I couldn’t even see while I was driving my car which caused me to get in a very big crash. Trump supporters ripped me from my car and dragged my body across the freeway causing me to have more injuries. The democrats came to save me Biden himself.But the trump supporters were ripping me from limb to limb showing me explicit photos of the president himself while doing so. Screaming for my phone I deleted the app & all was normal.
attributes.title: Tragic  experience
